title: Saudi Arabia : number of internet users 2015 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: With the ease of internet access , the number of social media users in india stood at 326.1 million in 2018 . This increase is relatively lower as compared to the growth that occurred between 2016 and 2017 . Nevertheless , the social network users in the country were expected to be almost 448 million in 2023 .
gold: This statistic provides information on the number of internet users in Saudi Arabia from 2015 to 2023 . In 2018 , Saudi Arabia had 28.5 million internet users . This figure is projected to grow to 35 million internet users in 2023 .
